articles.author: Laura He, Anna Cooban
articles.title: Global markets slide after Fitch downgrades US debt - CNN
articles.description: Global stock markets fell Wednesday after ratings agency Fitch downgraded its US credit rating, citing “a steady deterioration in standards of governance” and the American government’s growing debt burden.

articles.author: Wendy Lee
articles.title: Writers Guild and studios agree to talks three months after strike began - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: The Writers Guild of America said it will meet with the Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Producers on Friday to discuss resuming negotiations.
articles.content:
Representatives of the Writers Guild of America and the major studios have agreed to meet for the first time since the Hollywood writers strike began three months ago.

articles.title: Aid efforts for Haitians suffer blow with kidnapping of American nurse and daughter - NPR
articles.description: Gang warfare has increasingly plagued Haiti since the 2021 assassination of President Jovenel Moïse. Criminal control has worsened and today the innocent are often killed, raped and held for ransom.
articles.content: In this undated photo provided by El Roi Haiti, Alix Dorsainvil, right, poses with her husband, Sandro Dorsainvil. Alix Dorsainvil, a nurse for El Roi Haiti, and her daughter were kidnapped on Thursd… [+6043 chars]
